channel.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
channel.description:
Unseen Changes, ver Kape. EK - https://forum.imperium42.com/t/starting-king-changes/78177
Assassin: Apprentice - additionally, if the starting Assassin or MM become King, this passive is passed down once to the current convert. Distract - will additionally prevent voting.
Duchess: Bat Eyelashes (inf use): Reveal target players class type and faction.
Handmaiden: Analyze: (inf use): Target 2 players and get info based on their class type. If they have the same class type, you will learn their classes. If they have the same class group (flirt), you will learn that. Otherwise it will return incompatible.
Herbalist: Class type changed to Social.
Illusionist: Mind Blur replaced with Snoop (2 use).
Marshal: Probe - will additionally be able to target other Unseen, same feedback as Surveille. Probe - will return "X is Neutral" if you target a Neut class instead
Mastermind: Foresight (4 use): Learn target players converted class type. If they are convertable, you will additionally learn who they visit tonight.
Nightwatch: QoL change: Watch Carefully feedback updated to reference other abilities that return class. (Currently its a orange system message and thats ugly) Watch Carefully - will additionally be able to target other Unseen.
Poacher: QoL change: Fix the bug where Snare Trap returned multiple occupation messages under certain circumstances.
Timesnatcher: Dark Dimension (3 use): Disguise target member of the Unseen making them appear not suspicious to investigative checks. Can target self.

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Not really EI is just better in that situation. I don’t mind marshal being able to invest unseen I just think it encourages people to meme invest people

Read full topic

I doubt Surv will be abandoned, as it is too great of an info giver.

Well, it’s not gonna be Bewilder, maaaybe Silence, but idk yet.

item.description:
Kape:

Assassin:
Apprentice - additionally, if the starting Assassin or MM become King, this passive is passed down once to the current convert
Distract - will additionally prevent voting

Nah I think it’s fine how it is

Kape:

Duchess:
Bat Eyelashes (inf use): Reveal target players class type and faction.

Good Change

Kape:

Handmaiden:
Analyze: (inf use): Target 2 players and get info based on their class type.
If they have the same class type, you will learn their classes.
If they have the same class group (flirt), you will learn that.
Otherwise it will return incompatible.

Decent Change

Kape:

Herbalist:
Class type changed to Social.

Sure

Kape:

Illusionist:
Mind Blur replaced with Snoop (2 use).

Wtf? no mental blur shouldn’t be snoop but it should be reworked.

Kape:

Marshal:
Probe - will additionally be able to target other Unseen, same feedback as Surveille.
Probe - will return “X is Neutral” if you target a Neut class instead

What why you target unseen if your marshal this is pointless

Kape:

Nightwatch:
QoL change: Watch Carefully feedback updated to reference other abilities that return class. (Currently its a orange system message and thats ugly)
Watch Carefully - will additionally be able to target other Unseen

Same thing for Marshal.

Kape:

Servant:
New day ability: Bewilder (1 use): Prevent the King from voting and using his abilities for 30 seconds.

Sure

Kape:

Timesnatcher:
Dark Dimension (3 use): Disguise target member of the Unseen making them appear not suspicious to investigative checks. Can target self.

This is alright

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: Yattien
item.description:
Kape:

Duchess:
Bat Eyelashes (inf use): Reveal target players class type and faction.

Makes Duchess a good choice early on to help find Prince and NK, probably not as useful later when most people are out and the remainder are obvious enough to the Unseen.

Kape:

Handmaiden:
Analyze: (inf use): Target 2 players and get info based on their class type.
If they have the same class type, you will learn their classes.
If they have the same class group (flirt), you will learn that.
Otherwise it will return incompatible.

Discussed this on discord, agreed with it then, agree with it now.

Kape:

Herbalist:
Class type changed to Social.

Much better. They don’t do anything I’d consider “offensive”, manipulating the court (making people look like other classes) or giving fake results (drug) is more a social thing.

Kape:

Illusionist:
Mind Blur replaced with Snoop (2 use).

Not mentioned here, but mentioned in discord, change Illusionist PM to match your version of Mystic PM or it’s a hard confirm for the mystic.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Yeah, I think Observer is busted, so anything that lowers their power like a MM gaining access to tracking/watching is a plus in my book.

Would love to see the Princesses are MM’s meme change to Observers.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Solic:

(That’s looking at it a bit negatively, because the extra credibility you have as Nightwatch can also be used to pull a mislynch easier and then open up the conversion slot)

Honestly this is why I think Window Peek is better than just a 2 use faction check.

Specifically it’s a 2 use faction check on a class that is practically auto confirmed.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

For this, it seems like a semi nerfed Watch Carefully

I don’t think you can compare isolated abilities like that. Duchess also has Royal Blood and Dark Wisp. Observer is also going to be harder to fake once you are promoted to Assassin (albeit less so with this Foresight change) (That’s looking at it a bit negatively, because the extra credibility you have as Nightwatch can also be used to pull a mislynch easier and then open up the conversion slot)

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

Rewind only works if all healers are otherwise occupied (either literally, or metaphorically)

You’re thinking of time snatch. Rewind doesn’t care about healers.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Kape:

Because Timesnatcher has much more power than Duchess.
Rewind, Timesnatch AND a full team tailor? That’s too much.
Which additionally gives Duchess her own niche.

Rewind only works if all healers are otherwise occupied (either literally, or metaphorically)

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
I’m mostly saying that in case Foresight not being a reliable Princess fake is part of why Herb is still Offensive, Sage is the most offensive-like Support convert that could be changed imo.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Kape:

Sheriff bussing, not Obs bussing. Think using Surveille on your teammate, not Peek.

At least for one of them, you made it seem like WC could be used as a confirm for Peek in a Gossip.

Kape:

I’m making it be a slightly worse in most situations Probe, which is also infinite use. Also Duchess has Dark Wisp.

Then why not also nerf Dark Wisp if you nerfed DD?

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
katze:

I think Sage is more offensive than the other unseen supports, and if Foresight having unreliable results in a few cases is intended, swapping Herbalist and Sage would keep the amount of exceptions the same.

He’s more Support than Offensive and serves the function of a Support.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

if your target gets gossiped when using WC, then you would be outed as Nightwatch along with your teammate, as it shows the entire class.

Sheriff bussing, not Obs bussing. Think using Surveille on your teammate, not Peek.

JakeTheWolfie:

Basically an infinite semi nerfed WC.

I’m making it be a slightly worse in most situations Probe, which is also infinite use. Also Duchess has Dark Wisp.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Kape:

Gossip confirm, observer confirm + bussing plays.

if your target gets gossiped when using WC, then you would be outed as Nightwatch along with your teammate, as it shows the entire class.

Kape:
  • I’m changing how King works so I need to change all of them.
  • If I’m buffing the starting EK I need to counterbalance it with a s. GK buff too.

It was a joke. No starting king is GK.

Kape:

Exactly because of this. Bussing plays.

if your target gets gossiped when using WC, then you would be outed as Nightwatch along with your teammate, as it shows the entire class.

Kape:

Yes it’s limited, it’s for bussing plays with gossip confirmation.

if your target gets gossiped when using WC, then you would be outed as Nightwatch along with your teammate, as it shows the entire class.

Kape:

I would call it a sidegrade. Different class, different function.

You don’t get the class exactly, but there’s around a 1 in 3 chance that the BD Killer is Prince, a 100% chance that the Neutral Killer is… ahem, a 2 in 3 chance that the BD Support is a healer, etc. Basically an infinite semi nerfed WC.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
I think Sage is more offensive than the other unseen supports, and if Foresight having unreliable results in a few cases is intended, swapping Herbalist and Sage would keep the amount of exceptions the same.

But like Kape said, Not a big priority.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Notice how Support converts are the ones you take when you need extra Kill power and survivability.

Sage, Enforcer, Timesnatcher

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I wouldn’t change Sage’s class type. He’s closer to other Unseen supports than Unseen offensives in terms of function.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
The goal of this was to make all converts at least on par with each other. I might slightly nerf Enforcer if I get an idea on how to do it, but for now I’m leaving it like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Kape's Overall Unseen Rebalance
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

Why 30 seconds?

My new version of the King doesn’t have point so it’s changed slightly from it’s original version.
Also it’s much more present in the game since I’m planning on giving it to Pretender, Sellsword, Invoker, Sorcerer, so I have to balance it around there being multiple sources. Also 1v1 scenarios, this is Sorc specific actually.

Read full topic
